pullRequest.title: related to #6150: change GUI to something Locus-alike
pullRequest.bodyText:
related to #6150: change GUI to something Locus-alike
Will also fix #9327
For screenshots see #6150 (comment)

nodes.bodyText: Your hard-coded translations will be overwritten by crowdin automatically. So if you want to provide these translations, you will have to translate them via the crowdin UI after the PR was merged. Or, if you want to make it easy for yourself, you can simply ignore all the translations as outdated ones will be removed automatically...
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -777,7 +777,7 @@
     <string name="map_source_osm_cyclosm">CyclOSM</string>
     <string name="map_source_osm_offline">Offline</string>

nodes.bodyText: Then it would be the best to delete such lines.
